name: 3D Platformer (Kevin Neiger)
description:
This is a short and simple 3D platformer game created with Unity.  The purpose of the project was to practice fun player movement.  The player can walk or run, and has three jumps.  The jumps cycle when performed one after another, similar to Mario games.  

If I were to redo this project, I would change the movement slightly to include an acceleration for the character to get up to speed.  As is the movement feels good, except for when minute movements are necessary, leading to falling off platforms.  Accelerating up to speed, rather than just toggling the speed on, should fix this issue.

The textures, music, model and animations were all free assets, not created by me.
